## colnames/ rownames

```{r}
StuDF2 <- data.frame(
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  成績=c(80,60,90,70,50),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
StuDF2 
```

```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)
names(StuDF2)
```

```{r}
colnames(StuDF2) <- c("col1","col2","col3")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2
```

只改col2的名稱
```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)[[2]] <- c("姓名")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2

```
 

改col2,3的名稱
```{r}
colnames(StuDF2)[c(2,3)] <- c("name","grade")
colnames(StuDF2)
StuDF2

```
